channel.title: Help me make remmina or freerdp from sources
channel.description: Hello. I to try redirection microphone sound over rdp to win server 2012. But it's not work in old version remmina and freerdp. Can any body help me to make from sources in .deb file? For installing in whonix. With it we can use skype over rdp in vds without sound cards. I don't know how big voice delays wil be. Need tests. i'm test it https://github.com/FreeRDP

item.title: Help me make remmina or freerdp from sources
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
user12345:

Can any body help me to make from sources in .deb file?

“same as in Debian” as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Support#Free_Support_Principle

Read full topic
item.source: Help me make remmina or freerdp from sources

item.title: Help me make remmina or freerdp from sources
item.dc:creator: user12345
item.description:
Hello. I to try redirection microphone sound over rdp to win server 2012.
But it’s not work in old version remmina and freerdp.
Can any body help me to make from sources in .deb file? For installing in whonix.
With it we can use skype over rdp in vds without sound cards.
I don’t know how big voice delays wil be. Need tests. i’m test it
https://github.com/FreeRDP
